(OOC: New Persona of mine! :) Profile is down the bottom)

A pale gray Fox-Wolf Hybrid bot pads slowly through the shubbery, taking in everything he could. His fur colour wasn't much help to blend in, but it was his beast mode, and could do nothing about that.

He sighed deeply, he could detect some energy signatures (Quickstrike, Tarantulas, and whoever else is there) on his scanners. His head constantly shifted from side to side, seeking out creatures, while his ears were pricked up. 

At last, he came within sight of the bots. He saw the Snake-Scorpian was injured, quite seriously. His eyes narrowed and he mentally considered if he should go up to them.

For the moment, he would follow them. See if they were friendly. Or not.

=================

Name: Rexon
Faction: Neutral 
Gender: Male
Beast Mode: Grey Fox-Wolf Hybrid

Looks: In Beast Mode Rexon is slightly larger and better built than Foxes are, yet slightly smaller than a Wolf. He has pale amber eyes which have an eternally absent and sorrowful look in them.
In Robot Mode he has pale grey armour, with a silver cape swirling behind him. A huge battle axe handle sticks out from behind his shoulder. He has the Fox-Wolf head split in half for hands. His eyes are still a pale amber, and he has fangs for teeth.

Personality: Rexon is a very mysterious, dark warrior. He preffers to keep things to himself, like Dinobot. But when in battle, he is very quick, using the huge battle axe to scrap enemies that are threatening him or friends. 

Backround: This warrior was once a Predacon, but he grew a severe disliking for them until the point he tried to take them all on in hand to hand battle. He escaped, but was found again and tortured. Rexon was once a very active, fast talking robot, but now he has changed.
From that point on he didn't want to fight in the Wars, but since he came to Earth, he realised he had to.
